title: Get suggested line edits — line_editor
text: Highlight text editor window using Rstudio, select addin drop-menu. function sends selected text gpt-3.5-turbo chat model. system prompt : editorial writing assistant. task edit content receive improved clarity, flow, reduced word count. model receives highlighted text, generates response following prompt, returns new suggested text console.
